mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.course_code, c.course_name, c.credits, c.description, c.teacher_id, u.real_name AS teacher_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM student_course sc WHERE sc.course_id = c.id) AS student_count FROM course c LEFT JOIN "USER" u ON c.teacher_id = u.id
